meanings.sent1: The path was unobstructed, allowing us to walk freely.
meanings.sent2: The view from the top of the hill was unobstructed and breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel found an unobstructed way to reach the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: Her unobstructed joy was evident in her radiant smile.
meanings.sent5: The unobstructed sky was filled with twinkling stars.

meanings.sent1: The road ahead was unobstructed, making the journey easy.
meanings.sent2: The window provided an unobstructed view of the garden outside.
meanings.sent3: The unobstructed path to success was paved with hard work.
meanings.sent4: His unobstructed vision allowed him to see the solution clearly.
meanings.sent5: The unobstructed river flowed peacefully through the valley.
